ratings.comment: Took Spanish 359 with her, it was a fun class. She is nice but political and will share her opinions. The class was  disorganized, but it was her first time teaching Business Spanish. Would recommend.

I LOVED Gloria! She was my TA and she was so kind and amazing! She made discussions fun and generally cared about her students. She went out of her way to try new things and show us Spanish culture. She always had new music for us to listen to. She was willing to meet outside of class and help you with whatever you needed. 10/10 would reccomend.

Gloria is easily one of my favorite professors I've had. I was worried that I would not be able to understand her or get lost during class, but she was great! She made class fun but participation points are a huge part of your grade. If you can take one of her classes, I highly recommend.

She was a fantastic Spanish professor. I really enjoyed having her, and she was definitely my favorite professor I've had this semester, especially since it was online. I recommend her and I wish she was teaching future Spanish classes because she was really caring and kind and wanted us to do well!

She is kind and clearly wants students to succeed. She is always willing to help outside of class. The only difficulty I've had is that sometimes grammar questions don't get answered exactly due to misunderstanding; she is a native spanish speaker and might not be seeing the confusion from the same perspective or we're just not explaining it?

Very caring about students and puts a lot of effort into making sure everyone is actually learning conversational Spanish. Feedback for each assignment is very detailed and helpful. She's also happy to extend extra help if you are really struggling. Great teacher.
